user.title: Qcells Setup
user.description: Enter the IP and password for your Qcells inverter as well as how frequently it should be polled. Please refrain from using too quick of a value here.

data.ip_address_description: The IP address of your Qcells inverter.
data.integration_mode_description: How many sensors do you want this integration to expose? Simple covers most generally useful stats but detailed shows a lot more - mostly diagnostic statistics.
data.password_description: The installer password for your inverter.
data.update_interval_description: How often to poll the inverter for new data. For some reason home assistant is only doing this every 30 secs. IDK how to fix this yet.
data.display_precision_description: How many decimal places to display for sensor values. 2 is the default and recommended value.
